name: Cloud Security — Python Study Group Development CodeSpace
postCreateCommand: python -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && .venv/bin/python -m pip install ipykernel black pylint pre-commit && .venv/bin/python -m ipykernel install --user --name "${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}" || true
postStartCommand: echo 'Devcontainer ready — to use the workspace virtualenv run: source .venv/bin/activate' || true
